title: Welcome to Halo: Reach
message: Whether you're new to Reach or just joining us, we're glad you're here, and we hope you enjoy your stay.|n|nExperience the fateful moments that forged the Halo legend in Campaign, or jump into Matchmaking to battle against online foes in a variety of multiplayer modes.|n|nFor the latest Halo news and info, be sure to follow @Halo on Twitter. We'll see you online!
